website_summaries.verdict: Sony's relatively affordable WF-XB700 earphones deliver thunderous bass depth in a true wireless design.
pros: Powerful audio with seriously boosted bass
cons: Wildly boosted bass not for those seeking accurate sonic performance

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass just not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Great bass first of all, they fit ok but were too uncomfortable for me. The treble is good and they seem well made. I ordered a few of the main brands i have to say the galaxy buds plus were by far the best fit for me, overall sound and their app just did it for me for an all round good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after looking at the various reviews, firstly the sound is pretty good, but for me they just did not fit in my ears properly, and continually just kept falling out. Have returned to Amazon today.
customer_reviews.author: David Judd

customer_reviews.title: Equalizer!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly at the start there is too much bass. But once you adjust the equalizer to your liking they are amazing!!!!, you can tailor the speakers to your liking. Their great quality!!!! Ive now adjusted the equalizer and i am in love with them!!!! O yeah!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but mic has strange echo
customer_reviews.text: Great for noise cancelling. But they kept falling out of my ear. Also when using them for phone calls, there was enhanced sound of background noise which was the most prominent sound in conversations. Great if they fit in your ears and you do not want to use them for phone conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Soney WF XB700 wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and he loves them said the quality was great and were comfortable to wear Ellie.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Ready to dance lift!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful earbuds. They are very comfortable and stay nice and snug even after flailing around like an idiot in the gym. Sound is wonderful (I'm definitely not an audiophile though) bass is definitely boosted but not obnoxiously so. If you just wanna jam out in the gym (proper Terry Crews Euro Training style} then these are 100% what you want to get!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just taken delivery of the Sony headphones, really great fit with solid punchy sound, so far battery life is very good, 1 charge and used it for couple of days no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony produces the best sound in in ear and over ear headsets.
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds that fit well in the ear and produce crisp sound with great bass. And at the right price! Still worth paying extra for the sony 1000XM3, whose sole drawback is the larger battery case.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Angelopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sony WF-XB700 are great, sound quality very good, battery life amazing. I use these guys in the gym and have no problem. Bluetooth distance from my mobile 20 meters +.Buy again definitely. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality sound
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for earbuds with high quality sound below £100, this earbud is it
customer_reviews.author: Segun

customer_reviews.title: Looks stupid
customer_reviews.text: sounds great but sticks out way too far. I cannot go out in public with them in my ears...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing! Would defo recommend
customer_reviews.text: amazing!!! I love these, yes they are kind bulky but the are defo worth it for thr found quality and bass
customer_reviews.author: Emile Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: HAVE TO COMCENTRATE TO HEAR THE FAINTEST SOUND
customer_reviews.text: Product has come and it is so quiet. If i exhale loudly i cannot hear the music. Very very!!! dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Jade Grinter

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass, Poor Connection to TV/Laptops
customer_reviews.text: Had these extra bass Sony headphones for a week now. Great sound quality, strong bass and easy to use. Ideal for using with your phone. I've given this a 4 star as the ear buds don't have a stable connection to TV or laptops. I would use them on these devices with no problem, then all of a sudden there's no sound. Sometimes it would only be for a few seconds and other times... minutes. Good buy depending on what you're using these ear buds for. If you're listening to music in the gym or using this for sound on your phone, I would recommend. TV, laptops etc. I would not suggest these ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: So much to like about these. Having tried (and returned) cheaper models that were plagued by poor sound and frequent loss of connection, I decided to go up-market and was actively considering top-of-the-range pods from Apple or Samsung. Then I saw these from Sony, read all positive reviews, liked the price and bought - although with some trepidation considering my earlier experiences. However, any negative thoughts quickly disappeared as I find them excellent in all respects. They fit in the ears very comfortably and securely and are perfect for my gym workouts, walking and running. Great sound and I have yet to experience any drop-outs. A really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Metalheads.
customer_reviews.text: Had these a few days and so far love them. Twisted a bit too much and hurt my ear, my fault. Reading the reviews some people said that they are too bass heavy. As a true metalhead I find the bass just right. Listening to Great White i can hear the high hats clearly and the bass seems controlled. The middle was tight and on time. I have been using a pair of Soundpeats for the past year and they have served me well. These are a perfect upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: glanammanbear

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my boyfriend as a gift. I will say that is one of the best experience that we had with earphones. Even though, they are quite big, the shape and the way that sits in your ear will be a small impediment for how great these are. The sound is amazing, the bass is great, battery life is forever(9hr), these earphones are the best option if you don't want to spend a fortune on other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rusu B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with plenty of base. Selecting the right size buds creates a good fit, which offers great noise cancellation Been out for a run and the connection was great, the buds did not budge, despite their size. Button on left bud controls volume, one press to increase, press and hold to decrease. One push of button right bud pauses sound, two pushes skips forwards to next track, three times moves back a track. Slightly on the large size but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. EDWARDS

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they have arrived and seem to disconnect themselves from any device I use after roughly 10 minutes. Every time. For no reason. They have been charged up, I reset them, re initialised them and nothing works. I was hesitant in ordering wireless earphones, given the number of reviews I'd seen where they arrive with problems straight out of the box, and sadly these were no different. A lovely product when they're working--the bass and sound is very nice for this price, but these are not reliable. I am now returning them as I've explored all alternatives in the search for a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Seanoo

customer_reviews.title: sound great but fitting is not so good
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound really great with heavy bass but the fitting is not so good, it feel like bulky on your ears and not so comfortable, I will keep it for few more days just to see how it goes then i may return them. Overall sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: ahsan shafqat

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not for when driving the car
customer_reviews.text: All good apart from when driving in the car when I call the wifey and she is annoyed she can't hear me well she can't be bothered talking to me, she took a video with my daughter's phone so I can hear my voice and man I was so disappointed to realise the big crackling and banging noise and it only happens when the car is moving. Can anyone suggest better ear buds for when driving because I am tired of looking around
customer_reviews.author: Nacer Foudil Smail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are well balanced in-ear phones. The bass is excellent but does not detract from high end acoustics. Highly recommended. Bought them for my wife...and then had to buy them as well for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Took a punt at these wireless earbuds with the good reviews, the sound is very good with good bass with out the expense of higher end sounds. They fit ok but with the bulky size of these they do feel wobbly when in the gym but haven't fallen out as of yet
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Leadbeater

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these yesterday and first impressions are their great. I read reviews saying they were uncomfortable, quiet and poor sound quality. I would disagree. These fit and hold nice in the ear and have one button on each bud. The left button is for volume up down and the right pause and track forward and back. Really easy to use. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gary a

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley Fabulous quality product! Noise cancel action brilluant and volume excellent! Good price point I am 75 yrs old and take my dog out on my scooter! Don't miss any phone calls thank you Sony!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollyboots

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones. Sometimes they fall out of my ears but apart from that they have good sound quality and it also blocks out the noise pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sony product - great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and excellent Bluetooth connectivity. Better than expected and my go to set of ear phones now. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Flame

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about regarding the quality yet. Only a bit pricey, but definitely worth the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: evedris

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Ideal for gym.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using in the gym ir for at home workouts. I don't think they're that great for running as they do seem to slowly make their way out of the ear. I could do with some more sizes of the ear buds that would help. Bass is good, quality is good, overall good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggy F

customer_reviews.title: I'm delighted with these
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life, good quality sound, easy to pair, flawless connection to multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe how good they actually just locks in your ear, the sound it's just amazing and bass, for a while actually forgot I was using them because it fits so good in the ear
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Paiva

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects all the time - no online support. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so annoyed with these, all they do is keep disconnecting .. it's a shame because I love the sound quality but I can't recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W. S. Burden

customer_reviews.title: Volume control
customer_reviews.text: The volume control is very poor am slightly hard of hearing and struggle to find a comfortable volume.Also having difficulty pairing it with more than one device.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the first real truly wireless. Great sound no problem with fitting in the ears can't fault this product at all sony is the best way forward
customer_reviews.author: craig dudley

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is truly amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, only had the item a day but wow. So easy to connect and use. Comfortable to wear and actually feel secure which is reassuring.
customer_reviews.author: J A SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Gives me headaches and have the volume on maximum but still can’t hear well if the surroundings is noisy
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy, don't fall out easy, and have good sound quality
customer_reviews.author: emily williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. Great battery life and fit well in ears.
customer_reviews.author: MKING

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. Great sound though but not worth the premium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son seems happy......
customer_reviews.text: My son was pleased to give these a go as his wired version were getting sound scratchy as the wire disintegrated. They charge easily, and fit well in his ears (he's very touch sensitive so this is a big thing). The charge lasts too so there's no mad panic that he won't be able to listen to his music. Connection is easy and trouble free too - the case is great and is secure. Sound is complete - rounded, deep and yet crystal clear. Music sounds as good as the spoken word - I was really impressed. We really like these and are considering further purchases for other family members. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bellyobibblybob

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage sound....cannot understand all the good reviews....flat, tiny sound, bass?????! Seriously, i can hardly hear it, flat, dull, and nowhere near loud enough, can't believe I just spent £130 on this crap, bought them as a second paid to complement my jaybird vista's, the vista's destroy them in every way...Sony you were the best a few years ago...what happened. I've also noticed after taking the rubber tip off...the plastic part that connects to it is hollow????!!!! Seriously Sony? ( Picture attached)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: All about the bass, but fit is lacking
customer_reviews.text: They put 'extra bass' in the product name and, to be fair, they do deliver with a really rich bass that is at odds with their tiny size. At the top end they are clearly lacking but not disastrously so and, for their price, the sound is about par. The real selling point is that they are for active use, and I found the fit to be poor, even after trying the alternative rubber tips. They haven't fallen out yet, but they FEEL like they might, and the fit isn't good enough to for passive noise cancellation. Sweat-proof, and with touch controls, they tick most of the boxes for active buds, but the fit leaves me short of recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: A family of goats

customer_reviews.title: Extra bass headset
customer_reviews.text: These ear phones are chunky but nice looking, I think I prefer these to the sleeker ones. The earbuds are rubber and fit my ears well even with a tragus piercing. The battery life is good- not the best but good enough- 9 hours playtime on average volume, and a 10 minute charge gives 60 minute playback which is great for when I remember at the last moment that they need charging. Easy to set up and to connect with my phone. The extra bass on it is very good and I am very pleased with the sound. I like Sony products a lot and these prove to me why.
customer_reviews.author: Love reviewing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality earpods, as would be expected by Sony. They paired with my phone quickly and easily, and had a stable connection with no drop outs. They charge quickly. The sound quality is excellent, including in the bass register. They fit well, even staying snugly in place during exercise. They survived a few drops and bangs with no damage (oops!)
customer_reviews.author: N. Gratton

customer_reviews.title: Top quality from Sony!
customer_reviews.text: A very good pair of earbuds. The sound quality is incredible. I've always been a bit wary of earbuds as previous ones I've owned have been disappointing to say the least. These are great, and the battery life is very good too. You get a USB 3.0 cable inside and replacement earbud covers depending on the width of your ear canal. Fantastic and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

product_meta.title: Sony WF-XB700 Truly Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, with Extra Bass, up to 18h battery life, splash and sweat resistance, Built-in Mic and Voice Assistant - Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:BlackEnhance your everyday life with the WF-XB700 Truly Wireless Headphones Featuring EXTRA BASS for deep punchy sound they also offer long battery life of up to 18h a stable Bluetooth connection an ergonomic design for a secure fit and an IPX4 water resistance rating
feature_bullets: Up to 9h of battery life per single charge + additional full charge from the case, for up to 18h of unconfined playback on the WF-XB700 wireless earphones

Big on streaming? Our latest Bluetooth headphones chip transmits sound to the left and right wireless earbuds simultaneously providing a seamlessly stable and reliable connection to overcome vocal delays
Headphones ready for every eventuality, with an IPX4 water resistance rating splashes and sweat won't stop these true wireless sports headphones
These truely wireless earphones feature an Ergonomic Tri-hold structure for a secure and comfortable fit
Easy-to-operate buttons let you control playback, access your smartphone's Voice Assistant and make hands-free calls on your Sony headphones

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
